title: Decision Tree Example
text: main input data two column data frame tibble edges. must two columns, first column containing node names “” nodes, second containing node names “” nodes. Node names must unique. Optionally, also define additional node attributes. Create flowchart using ggflowchart() function.  Optionally, add styling using {ggplot2} theme() function title using labs() function.
code: goldilocks <- tibble::tibble(from = c("Goldilocks",                               "Porridge", "Porridge", "Porridge",                               "Just right",                               "Chairs", "Chairs", "Chairs",                               "Just right2",                               "Beds", "Beds", "Beds",                               "Just right3"),                      to = c("Porridge",                             "Too cold", "Too hot", "Just right",                             "Chairs",                             "Still too big", "Too big", "Just right2",                             "Beds",                             "Too soft", "Too hard", "Just right3",                             "Bears!")) node_data <- tibble::tibble(name = c("Goldilocks", "Porridge", "Just right", "Chairs",                                      "Just right2", "Beds", "Just right3", "Too cold",                                      "Too hot", "Still too big", "Too big", "Too soft",                                      "Too hard", "Bears!"),                             type = factor(c(1, 2, 3, 2, 3, 2, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 1))) %>%   dplyr::mutate(label = gsub("\\d+$", "", name)) ggflowchart(goldilocks, node_data) library(ggplot2) ggflowchart(goldilocks, node_data) +   labs(title = "The Goldilocks Decision Tree",        caption = "N. Rennie") +   theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "lightblue"),         plot.title = element_text(size = 20, hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"))

title: Flowcharts with ggplot2
text: Install package using: Note: package currently work--progress. See vignettes usage. Upcoming features: Changing fill colour based node attributes. Changing linetype colour arrows based edge attributes. Better compatibility {ggplot2} e.g. inheriting aesthetics. Using labels equal node names. Add check make sure nodes node_data contained layout.

text: Adds additional information node e.g. variable colour

text: node_layout Data frame node layout returned get_layout(). node_data Data frame tibble node information. Must least one column called "name" node names join .

title: Get nodes — get_nodes
text: node_layout Data frame node layout returned get_layout() x_nudge Distance centre edge node box x direction. Default 0.35. y_nudge Distance centre edge node box y direction. Default 0.25.
